rules.text: Be nice and have fun! Use content warnings (CW) and #hashtags liberally.

No hate speech. Do not use pejorative or discriminatory language with reference to a person or a group on the basis of who they are, in other words, based on their religion, ethnicity, nationality, race, colour, descent, gender, sexual orientation or other identity factor.
Criticize ideas, not people. Do not "shitpost" or post in bad faith, engage in name calling, or ad hominem attacks.
Do not harass anyone, or post other people’s personally identifying information ("doxing").
Do not post illegal, illicit, or unlicensed content.

records.text: I keep getting letters from PG&E comparing our electricity usage with that of "similar" homes. It stated that "similar" homes to ours used 97 kWh/month. Where are these houses? We unplugged all equipments we can think of when we went on vacation. And we already used that amount. I wonder how similar are those homes to ours? They never listed the criteria. What a waste of money and then keep asking for more of it from us. I'm all for informing the consumers. But this is useless information.

records.text: I keep getting letters from PG&E comparing our electricity usage with that of "similar" homes. It stated that "similar" homes to ours used 97 kWh/month. Where are these houses? We unplugged all equipments we can think of when we went on vacation. And we already used that amount. I wonder how similar are those homes to ours? They never listed the criteria. What a waste of money and then keep asking for more of it from us. I'm all for informing the consumers. But this is useless information.
